title: Fun for all the family
text:
Home » travel » Fun for all the family GETAWAYS Fun for all the family THE NATION July 22, 2015 1:00 am 
Private rice planting experience for the entire family complete with souvenir photo at the Dhara Dhevi Chiang Mai The Dhara Dhevi Chiang Mai, a luxury resort in Northern Thailand, is now offering an exclusive "Family Fun Experience" package CHIANG MAI Fun for all the family The Dhara Dhevi Chiang Mai , a luxury resort in Northern Thailand, is now offering an exclusive "Family Fun Experience" package. It's priced at Bt59,000 per suite and covers a family stay of 3 nights for two adults and up to two children under the age of 12. Benefits include accommodation upgrade to the Deluxe Colonial Suite, extra bed set-up for children, daily buffet breakfast for two, Thai set dinner for two, kids' meals when dining with the parents from kids' menu, 60 minutes of traditional spa treatment for two at The Dheva Spa and Wellness Centre, private rice planting experience for the entire family complete with souvenir photo, complimentary scheduled activities for kids each day and roundtrip transfer between hotel and Chiang Mai International Airport. The offer is available from now until September 30. Call (053) 888 888 or e-mail: reservations@dharadhevi.com. RAYONG Worth its Salt Give your mother the gift she deserves by treating her to a scrumptious dinner buffet featuring international and Thai cuisine at Marriott Resort Rayong's C-Salt restaurant. Book now and receive a special Mother's day drink plus a voucher valued at up to Bt1,000 valid at the restaurants. The buffet dinner is priced at Bt899 and served from 6 to 10pm. Call (038) 998 000 or e-mail: RayongReservation@marriott.com. HONG KONG Summer in the city From now to August 31, visitors will find their trips to Hong Kong more rewarding than ever, as the Hong Kong Tourism Board (HKTB) rolls out the massive Hong Kong Summer Fun campaign providing visitors with such delights as tempting offers on tourism products and hotel rooms. Visitors can also take part in two lucky draws at Hong Kong International Airport, namely the "Instant Mega Draw", which guarantees a prize for every visitor, and the "Return to Hong Kong like a Millionaire" draw, with the prize of a luxury return trip to Hong Kong. Visit www.DiscoverHongKong.com. BANGKOK Book early to save Enjoy an early bird advantage when booking a room at the Ambassador Hotel Bangkok. Experience cordial Thai hospitality in the heart of Bangkok and take advantage of the incredible rates by reserving early. The package costs just Bt1,360 per room per night with complimentary use of gym, Wi-Fi and Coffee & Tea in room. The offer is good from now until December 31. Call (02) 254 0444 extension 1220-4 or e-mail: rsvmbkk@amtel.co.th. LAOS Rolling on the river Mekong River Cruises invite you to savour the fantastic scenery of the Mekong River on a spectacular and unique cruise from Luang Prabang in Laos to the Golden Triangle on the Thai side from September 16 to 21. The 6-day cruise rates per person are US$830 (single surcharge: $315) for Eco cabin, US$920 (single surcharge $350) for Classic cabin and $1,250 (single surcharge $590) for Superior cabin. The rate includes 5 nights aboard the boutique river vessel, all meals and tour programme, coffee, tea and water during meal times on board (juice for breakfast), all excursions and necessary entry fee, presentations and lectures by cruise director and transfers from/to Luang Prabang to Chiang Rai airport or your hotel in town. E-mail: team@cruisemekong.com or visit www.cruisemekong.com. SOUTH KOREA Gangnam style Starwood Hotels & Resorts welcomes visitors to South Korea with discounts of up to 50 per cent discount at its eight hotels across the country. For bookings made from today to July 31 at Sheraton Incheon Hotel, Westin Chosun Seoul, Four Points by Sheraton Seoul, Namsan, Sheraton Seoul D Cube City Hotel, Aloft Seoul Gangnam, W Seoul Walkerhill, Sheraton Grande Walkerhill and Westin Chosun Busan, guests will enjoy great savings as well as experience each property's distinctive and compelling brand programmes. The promotion applies to stays between now and December 31. Visitwww.korea.starwoodoffers.com/RHDKOREA/en. 241 Viewed
